summary: Hermione is clearly upset after receiving detention for the dragon incident, and even more so when she learns it involves going into the Forbidden Forest. When Malfoy tries to scare her with talk of dangerous creatures, she refuses to back down, displaying a quiet resolve. Despite her fear, she doesn’t let Malfoy intimidate her, showing emotional strength that’s grown since her early days at Hogwarts.
logline: Fearful but resolute, Hermione refuses to let Malfoy undermine her courage on the eve of detention.
speech_style: Tense but controlled; defensive when provoked, calm under scrutiny
location: Hogwarts Entrance Hall / Forbidden Forest edge
